title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Enabled push protection for multiple secret types (Airtable, AWS, Block Protocol, Cohere, Databricks, Limbar, Netflix, Rainforest) in secret scanning configuration files (`public-docs.yml`).
Added `gradle-wrapper.properties` to Dependabot's supported Gradle files list.
Updated tutorial wording from "how-to" to "tutorial" for clarity.
summary:

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Enabled push protection for multiple secret types (Airtable, AWS, Block Protocol, Cohere, Databricks, Limbar, Netflix, Rainforest) in secret scanning configuration files (`public-docs.yml`).
- Added `gradle-wrapper.properties` to Dependabot's supported Gradle files list.
- Updated tutorial wording from "how-to" to "tutorial" for clarity.

### Title
